arts.ttl: Brentford 2-2 Chelsea: Bees score injury-time equaliser to earn draw
arts.sum: Chelsea - with a rotated team ahead of their Champions League clash with Bayern Munich on Tuesday - were slow off the mark and were struggling to threaten Brentford's defence. However, Brentford would refuse to lose this one as an injury-time goal from Fabio Carvalho ensured that the Bees would leave with a point.

arts.ttl: Carvalho to the rescue! Brentford secure last-gasp draw against Chelsea
arts.sum: Fabio Carvalho scores a 93rd-minute leveller as Brentford hold Chelsea to a 2-2 draw in the West London derby on Saturday night.

arts.ttl: Cole Palmer Snaps 242 Day Cold Streak for Chelsea Against Brentford
arts.sum: The Blues ended up conceding a goal in stoppage time to spoil a second-half surge.

arts.ttl: Brentford’s Fábio Carvalho hits last-gasp equaliser to frustrate Chelsea
arts.athr: John Brewin at the Gtech Community Stadium
arts.sum: Even if Enzo Maresca is blessed with one of the deepest squads in the Premier League, heavy rotation presented a risk factor for Chelsea. The Italian rolled the dice, and Chelsea duly dropped two points from a game they thought they had rescued. Brentford, despite a change of personnel and manager, were motivated and highly dangerous. Keith Andrews’ team closely resembled the Thomas Frank era in their dedication and spirit. Despite Moisés Caicedo’s pile-driving goal, Chelsea’s second, they maintained a heavy threat. Robert Sánchez was asked to make a scrabbling save from Dango Ouattara’s snap shot but that would not be the last of it; in the 95th minute, Fábio Carvalho bundled home, Chelsea’s defenders allowing the substitute to tap in unmarked at the back post from a long throw. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Carvalho snatches late draw for Brentford against Chelsea
arts.sum: Watch Premier League highlights as Fabio Carvalho scores an injury-time equaliser for Brentford to earn a 2-2 draw with West London rivals Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Brentford 2-2 Chelsea: Bees substitute cancels out Moises Caicedo's stunner with stoppage time goal to deny Blues top spot - as Enzo Maresca's side are undone by hosts' secret weapon
arts.sum: KIERAN GILL: The Hail Mary of a long throw was enough for Brentford to equalise and deny Chelsea the turnaround win they thought had been sealed after Enzo Maresca had called on his cavalry.

arts.ttl: Fabio Carvalho snatches last-gasp point for Brentford to deny Chelsea
arts.sum: The Blues looked set to climb to Premier League summit when Moises Caicedo put them ahead in the 85th minute, but Carvalho had the last say.

arts.ttl: Brentford snatch late draw from long throw to deny Chelsea
arts.sum: Fabio Carvalho tapped in a 93rd-minute equaliser from a long throw to earn Brentford a 2-2 draw after Moises Caicedo had smashed Chelsea ahead late on.

arts.ttl: Chelsea Player Ratings vs. Brentford: Blues’ Comeback Attempt Spoiled in 2–2 Draw
arts.sum: The Blues conceded late from a long throw to ruin second-half goals from Cole Palmer and Moisés Caicedo.

arts.ttl: 'The long throw is back in business!' Brentford level against Chelsea
arts.sum: Fabio Carvalho nets from trademark Brentford long throw
